list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a cultivated plant that is grown as food, especially a grain, fruit, or vegetable.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the main crops were oats and barley
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cây trồng chính là yến mạch và lúa mạch

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a group or amount of related people or things appearing or occurring at one time.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cây trồng hiện tại của các chính trị gia

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a hairstyle in which the hair is cut very short.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she has her hair cut in a short crop
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy bị cắt tóc trong một vụ mùa ngắn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a pouch in a bird's gullet where food is stored or prepared for digestion.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the parent waxbill partially digests food in its crop
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Waxbill cha mẹ tiêu hóa một phần thức ăn trong vụ mùa của nó

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the entire tanned hide of an animal.
cut (something, especially a person's hair) very short.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she cropped her long golden hair
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy cắt tóc vàng dài

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of an animal) bite off and eat the tops of (plants).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the horse was gratefully cropping the grass
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Con ngựa đang biết ơn trồng cỏ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: harvest (plants or their produce) from a particular area.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: hay would have been cropped several times through the summer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: hay sẽ đã được cắt vài lần trong suốt mùa hè
